info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 15 at 10:08PM CDT until March 15 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FOR EAST CENTRAL LINCOLN AND CALHOUN COUNTIES UNTIL 1030 PM CDT... AT 1006 PM CDT...NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE DOPPLER RADAR INDICATED A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM CAPABLE OF PRODUCING QUARTER SIZE HAIL. THIS STORM WAS LOCATED NEAR WINFIELD...OR 9 MILES SOUTHEAST OF ELSBERRY... MOVING EAST AT 20 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... BATCHTOWN...BEECHVILLE AND MEPPEN. ...HAIL <50MPH 1.00IN
info.instruction: SEVERE THUNDERSTORMS PRODUCE DAMAGING WIND IN EXCESS OF 60 MILES PER HOUR...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL...DEADLY LIGHTNING...AND VERY HEAVY RAIN. FOR YOUR PROTECTION MOVE TO AN INTERIOR ROOM ON THE LOWEST FLOOR OF YOUR HOME OR BUSINESS. HEAVY RAINS FLOOD ROADS QUICKLY SO DO NOT DRIVE INTO AREAS WHERE WATER COVERS THE ROAD.
